prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with vibrant red and blue feathers, showcasing a playful personality.
Show me a dinosaur-inspired Pokemon that has distinct yellow wings and a friendly demeanor.
Imagine a prehistoric Pokemon that looks like a bird with a bright color palette and energetic stance.
Design a small Pokemon with a unique blend of red, blue, and yellow, perfect for a forest setting.
Give me a Pokemon that combines a dragon-like appearance with cheerful colors and a curious nature.
Generate a creature that has a combination of feathered wings and a playful attitude, set in grasslands.
Make a Pokemon that features a bright red head, blue wings, and an adventurous spirit, thriving in urban areas.
